name: Border Army Assault Sniper Shooter Attack
name_original: Border Army Assault Sniper Shooter Attack
description:
Army enemy beasts have attacked the nation with the heavy artillery and great army powers. To protect the nation’s interests now it is your duty to save the soldiers’ lives by the best snipper killing skills. Take the aim and kill the enemy with the precision. Before you kill just mind that enemy terrorist army has invaded with the tanks so to get back at them, have access to the launchers and heavy guns. Take aim at the military gunfire squads to and kill the assassins.
In- app purchases
• Unlock Levels- You can unlock all the exciting border army Assault sniper and play the level of your choice.
• Restore In app- In case of uninstalling and reinstalling the game, just use the restore button and get the levels unlocked again without any cost if you had accessed in app purchases before.
Border Army assault Sniper shooter Attack features:

• Number 1 shooting FPS game ever
• Unlock the weapons with the rewarded video and create more destruction to the enemy units.
• Featuring realistic 3D graphics with a streamlined flow in the gameplay
• Immaculate storyline, as the Border attacks by the enemy armies happen all the time but never feature in a game.
• With the inclusion of drag & tap to shoot and zoom slider on the right side of screen, even better to zoom and target the enemy. Efficiency of controls is top notch
• Enemy looked for a big hissy fit considering their numbers. Silent them alone, become the lone protector of the land, let the fellow soldiers rest a little
• Arsenal full of unlimited ammunition for a single soldier
•Purchase the "Remove ADs" package to play the ads free version of the games
